thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 19 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Süss Microtec: Sales And EBIT In FY 2017 Below Previous Expectations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Süss Microtec: Sales And EBIT In FY 2017 Below Previous Expectations
text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - SUESS MICROTEC SE:
* DGAP-ADHOC: SÜSS MICROTEC SE: SALES AND EBIT IN FINANCIAL YEAR 2017 BELOW PREVIOUS EXPECTATIONS
* SALES IN 2017 FINANCIAL YEAR ARE EXPECTED TO REACH A VALUE OF AROUND EUR 166 MILLION.
* EBIT WILL FALL BELOW PREVIOUSLY EXPECTED RANGE OF EUR 15 TO 19 MILLION IN FINANCIAL YEAR 2017
* EXPECTS 2017 EBIT OF AROUND EUR 14 MILLION * ORDER BACKLOG OF APPROXIMATELY EUR 133 MILLION AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
